page.title: 09CLOTHES
page.content: Most children wear blue jeans and tee-shirts for playing. In the summer shorts are popular. In school we wear a dress or a skirt and blouse. Some girls wear trousers. When we go on to the Comprehensive School we have to wear school uniform which is grey trousers and a grey, white or blue shirt for the boys and navy blue skirt and white or blue blouse for girls. Quite a lot of girls have their ears pierced and so do some of the boys. They wear small gold rings or studs called "sleepers" to stop the hole from sealing up. In the evenings they wear larger, more colourful ear-rings. Men who work in offices and shops often go to work in suits with shirts and ties. Shoes are of leather or plastic and trainers (sports shoes) are very popular for casual wear.
